title: The Adventure Zone: Dust Season 2 - Episode 2
description: The Graysons stake out the station to find a way onto their quarry. Augustus finds out some bad news. Indrid talks to an old friend. Callan shows off his skills. Lulu offers an exchange.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (Travis McElroy, Justin McElroy, Griffin McElroy, Clint McElroy, Erika Ishii)
